summary: This module implements the core handlers and helper utilities for creating, updating, and managing bibliographic records (books, editions, works, and authors) within the Open Library platform. It processes form submissions, validates and sanitizes input, integrates with external services such as Solr and recaptcha, performs spam checks, and provides autocomplete endpoints for authors, works, and languages.
business_intent: Enable users and administrators to efficiently add and edit catalog entries while ensuring data quality, preventing spam, and supporting search and discovery features through integrated validation, security checks, and search index updates.
